items.title: Coupang Stock Heads Toward 8-Month Lows As Korea’s Biggest Data Breach Triggers CEO Exit — Retail Flags ‘Orchestrated Selloff’
items.description: Coupang remains under pressure as a massive data breach drives regulatory scrutiny, leadership changes and heightened risk concerns from analysts.

items.title: US Oil Crashes Below $55 For First Time Since 2021 As Supply Floods The Market
items.description: Oversupply, soft demand, and fading geopolitical risk are dragging crude lower while easing inflation pressure.
